comment.brief: Offset on the path measured in time: a value from 0..1, where each segment is considered the same length. The actual length of the segments is not considered.
comment.full: Offset on the path measured in time: a value from 0..1, where each segment is considered the same length. The actual length of the segments is not considered.

comment.brief: Offset on the path measured in an approximate distance. Each offset step will cover roughly the same amount of length along the path.
comment.full:
Offset on the path measured in an approximate distance. Each offset step will cover roughly the same amount of length along the path.

For performance reasons this is a rough estimate of distance. Its precision may also change in future version (for the better)

comment.brief: Offset on the path measured in an approximate distance. Each offset step will cover roughly the same amount of length along the path.
